title: Missing LP
body:
i just wont a ranked game and received 22 lp but it only raised my lp to 19 from 0. so somehow im missing out on 3 lp
http://imgur.com/DgskVvh
solo que as velkoz 5v5 ranked game.

replies.body:
Thank you for the report!

I just to assure you, you got the right amount of LP - 22. You did previous lose LP and was sitting at a negative value because of queue dodge penalty.

Just as a reminder, please TAG your bug reports. It helps a lot!
okay thank you. what do you mean by tag them? i guess i should go re read the bug report procedures.
<------ On the side panel, just add [Gameplay] , [Client], [Crash] to the beginning of your bug report.
